## ğŸ“‹ General Diagnostic Commands

### Check LUMEN Status
```bash
curl http://localhost:7125/server/lumen/status | jq
```

### Check LUMEN Logs
```bash
# Full logs
sudo journalctl -u moonraker | grep LUMEN | tail -100

# Follow live
sudo journalctl -u moonraker -f | grep LUMEN
```

### Check GPIO Proxy
```bash
# Service status
sudo systemctl status ws281x-proxy

# Proxy logs
sudo journalctl -u ws281x-proxy | tail -50

# Test proxy directly
curl http://127.0.0.1:3769/status
```

### Test State Transitions
```bash
# Test each state manually
curl -X POST "http://localhost:7125/server/lumen/test_event?event=idle"
curl -X POST "http://localhost:7125/server/lumen/test_event?event=heating"
curl -X POST "http://localhost:7125/server/lumen/test_event?event=printing"
curl -X POST "http://localhost:7125/server/lumen/test_event?event=cooldown"
curl -X POST "http://localhost:7125/server/lumen/test_event?event=error"
```

### List Available Colors
```bash
curl http://localhost:7125/server/lumen/colors | jq
```

### Hot Reload Config
```bash
curl -X POST "http://localhost:7125/server/lumen/reload"
```

---

## ğŸ†˜ Still Stuck?

1. **Enable debug mode** in moonraker.conf:
   ```ini
   [lumen]
   debug: console
   ```

2. **Capture full logs**:
   ```bash
   sudo journalctl -u moonraker | grep LUMEN > lumen_debug.log
   sudo journalctl -u ws281x-proxy > proxy_debug.log
   ```

3. **Open an issue**: [GitHub Issues](https://github.com/MakesBadDecisions/Lumen_RPI/issues)
   - Use the [bug report template](ISSUE_TEMPLATE/bug_report.md)
   - Attach logs
   - Include lumen.cfg
